JUST LISTED 🔑| The Ultimate in Opulent Waterfront Living ✨| Offered at: $7,500,000

Welcome to… 1530 Island Blvd, Aventura, FL 33160📍

Welcome to the epitome of opulence at Williams Island, Aventura’s most coveted gated enclave, where sweeping water vistas harmonize with the height of luxury living. This extraordinary 5-bedroom, 6.5-bath estate in Villa Flora has undergone a meticulous $3M transformation, blending timeless grandeur with cutting-edge smart home technology. Featuring a majestic foyer with a regal spiral staircase, a chef’s gourmet kitchen, expansive walk-in closets, a distinguished indoor bar, and sweeping terraces. Outdoors, revel in a private pool & jacuzzi, an opulent summer kitchen & BBQ with a full bar, and pristine waterfront with generous optional dock space, epitomizing elite waterfront living. A 3-car garage completes this royal domain. Schedule a private tour today!
